name: michaelajaritz
description: The personal website of Michaela Jaritz, business coach and trainer.

scripts.deploy:coverage: npm run deploy -- ./dist/coverage/lcov-report -n mj-coverage && npm run alias -- $COVERAGE_URL
scripts.deploy:storybook: npm run deploy -- ./dist/storybook/ --config=./now.storybook.js -n mj-coverage && npm run alias -- $STORYBOOK_URL
scripts.deploy:website: npm run deploy -- -n mj-website && npm run alias -- $WEBSITE_URL
scripts.deploy:all: npm run do:coverage && npm run do:storybook && npm run deploy:website
scripts.do:coverage: npm run generate:coverage && npm run deploy:coverage
scripts.do:storybook: npm run generate:storybook && npm run deploy:storybook

author: Lucas Vogel <contact@vogelino.com> (http://vogelino.com/)
